pages.text: Yunnanoascus is a genus of enigmatic animal known from the Maotianshan Shale. This around 2cm-tall animal was first described in 2007, and it was originally described as a member of ctenophore. However, study in 2016 considered that it was actually a jellyfish, which makes it the earliest jellyfish ever known. As interpreted as a jellyfish, it was considered to have sensory structures called rhopalia. In 2023 however, its affinity as jellyfish was questioned and a ctenophore affinity is suggested again.
